\begin{document}
\title{St.~Paul Opus 36}
\author{Mendelssohn\\
Text : Schubring, Mendelssohn.}
\maketitle
\begin{center}
Oratoria for Solo Voices,\\
Chorus and Orchestra
\par\end{center}
\begin{abstract}
English `translation' by David P.S.~Fong. Translation is via paraphrasing
from Holy Bible, New International Version (NIV). This might not result
in a `literal' translation of the German text! English passages in
\emph{italics} are sourced from New English Bible translation provided
by EMI with their 1977 recording of `Paulus' performed by the D{\"u}sseldorfer
Symphoniker conducted by Rafael Fr{\"u}hbeck de Burgos. German text
sourced from the same recording. Please inform David Fong of all errors
via \emph{vkelim@bigpond.com.}
\end{abstract}
\bigskip

Herr! Herr! Herr!

Der Du bist der Gott,

Der Himmel und Erde und das Meer gemacht.

Herr, de Du bist der Gott,

Der Himmel und Erde und das Meergemacht.

 & \emph{Acts 4:24} & Lord! Lord! Lord!

Sovereign Lord!

You made the heaven and earth and sea.

Sovereign Lord,

You made the heaven and earth and sea.\tabularnewline
Die Heiden lehnen sich auf, Herr,

Wider Dich und Deinen Christ. & \emph{Acts 4:25--26}

\emph{Ps 2:1--2} & The nations rage 

against the Lord and

against his Anointed One.\tabularnewline
Und nun, Herr, siehe ah ihr Droh'n.

Und gib Deinen Knechten.

Mit aller Freudigkeit zu reden Dein Wort.

Herr! Herr! Herr! & \emph{Acts 4:29} & Now, Lord, consider their threats 

and enable your servants 

to speak your word with great boldness.

Lord! Lord! Lord!\tabularnewline

Uns r{\"u}hren kann kein Schade.

Ganz undermess'n ist seine Macht,

Nur das geschieht, was er bedacht.

\multicolumn{3}{c}{\emph{Bass (Saul)}}\tabularnewline
Ich danke dir, Herr, mein Gott.

Von ganzem Herzen ewiglich;

Denn deine G{\"u}te ist gro{\ss} {\"u}ber mich,

Und du hast meine Seele errettet aus der tiefsten H{\"o}lle.

Herr, mein Gott, ich danke dir. & \emph{Psa 86:12--13} & I will praise you,

O Lord my God, with all my heart;

I will glorify your name forever,

For great is your love toward me;

you have delivered me

from the depths of the grave.

I will praise you, O Lord my God.\tabularnewline

der dir erschienen ist auf dem Wege,

da du herkamst,

da {\ss} du wieder sehend und mit

dem Heiligen Gesit erf{\"u}llt werdest. & \emph{Acts 9:17} & Brother Saul, the Lord --- Jesus,

who appeared to you on the road

as you were coming here ---

has sent me so that you may see again

and be filled with the Holy Spirit.\tabularnewline
 &  & \tabularnewline
\multicolumn{3}{c}{\emph{Soprano}}\tabularnewline

fell from Saul's eyes,

and he could see again.

He got up and was baptized.\tabularnewline

da{\ss} dieser ist der Christ. & \emph{Acts 7:20} & At once he began to preach in the synagogues

We too are only men,

human like you.

who made heaven and earth

and sea and everything in them\tabularnewline
